name: Tabula Sono
description: Tabula Sono is an online, free-to-play 3D virtual tabletop. No ports, servers, or firewalls to manage. Play any grid-based RPGs like DnD, Pathfinder, Lancer, and Monster of the Week with your friends online. Sono is inspired by that in-person tabletop experience — sitting around the table with friends, whiteboard markers, and miniatures.
